se.fnord.xmms2.client.commands
Class Playlist

java.lang.Object
  se.fnord.xmms2.client.commands.Playlist

public class Playlist
extends java.lang.Object

Contains static factory methods to create commands for playlist related activities.

append

public static Command append(java.lang.String playlist,
                             int[] tracks)
Creates a command that requests the given ids to be appended to a playlist.

Parameters:
playlist - the playlist.
tracks - array of ids to append to the playlist.
Returns:
The command that will perform the request.

insert

public static Command insert(java.lang.String playlist,
                             CollectionExpression expression,
                             int to)
Creates a command that requests the result of the given collection expression to be inserted into a playlist.

Parameters:
client - The (connected) client to query.
playlist - the playlist.
expression - the collection expression.
to - the destination index.
Returns:
The command that will perform the request.

move

public static Command move(java.lang.String playlist,
                           int[] from,
                           int to)
Creates a command that requests the playlist items at the indices listed in from will be moved to a consecutive array starting at index 'to'.

Parameters:
playlist - the playlist.
from - an array of source indices
to - the destination index.
Returns:
The command that will perform the request.

removeEntries

                                    int[] ids)
Creates a command that requests the playlist items with the given ids to be removed from the playlist.

Parameters:
playlist - the playlist.
ids - an array of ids.
Returns:
The command that will perform the request.
